Amarillo.Texas Tornado (roller coaster):
The Texas Tornado is a steel roller coaster at Wonderland amusement park in Amarillo, Texas.


== Ride Layout ==
Riders begin by climbing the chain lift hill beside the highway to the coaster's highest point of 80 ft (24.4 m) before it heads down the first drop. Immediately after the drop, the train powers through a 72 ft (30 m) tall vertical loop before heading along an elevated section nearly level section of track with a slight dip to the right.
